name: Clumsy Scuba Diver
description:
The clumsy scuba diver is wandering around under the water near the shore. All the sudden, a vicious shark swims nearby. Your job is to guide the diver to swim through all sorts of undersea obstacles to reach the shore safely.

Features:
* Simple one finger touch control to flap the diver
* Stunning HD quality graphics
* Google Game Play Services integration for leaderboards

How to Play:
* Tap anywhere to dive down
* Release to float up
* Dodge the pipes

Google Play URL:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com....

iOS version will come soon
